ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: The Kindly consider you, I believe is the highest faction rating. I have that now with the Knights of Marr, after killing alot of guards. It amuses me that the
ygData.messageBody:
The Kindly consider you, I believe is the highest faction rating. I have
that now with the Knights of Marr, after killing alot of guards. It
amuses me that the Bards in Freeport only consider me amiably, while the
knights kindly consider me.

heh

-Luini-

>I've noticed the sisters of Erollisi "kindly consider me"
>instead of considering me amiably or indifferently. Is this
>what other people are seeing from NPCs with the same diety?
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>
>
